hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Mas`ud:A man came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! What do you say about a man who loves some people but cannot catch up with their good deeds?" Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Everyone will be with those whom he loves

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ عَلاَمَةِ حُبِّ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ
